reference.shortdesc: Compares an Ant property value against a list of values supplied to the extension point in the plug-in descriptor file.

section.p: This action expands to a series of not tests—one for each value supplied to the extension point—and returns a true value if the Ant property value does not match any of the values.

ul.li:
Specify the name of the Ant property value to check with the property attribute.
If omitted, the transtype property is checked.
Specify the values for the extension point with the feature element in the plug-in descriptor file.

section.p: Use the pre-defined extension point dita.conductor.transtype.check either to list the available transformation types or test a property value against the available transformation types, depending on the behavior attribute.

ul.li: Test property against transformation types:<dita:extension id="dita.conductor.transtype.check" behavior="" property="transtype"/>
